sn36.6:1.1: “Assutava, bhikkhave, puthujjano sukhampi vedanam vedayati, dukkhampi vedanam vedayati, adukkhamasukhampi vedanam vedayati.
sn36.6:1.2: Sutava, bhikkhave, ariyasavako sukhampi vedanam vedayati, dukkhampi vedanam vedayati, adukkhamasukhampi vedanam vedayati.
sn36.6:1.3: Tatra, bhikkhave, ko viseso ko adhippayaso kim nanakaranam sutavato ariyasavakassa assutavata puthujjanena”ti?
sn36.6:1.5: assutava, bhikkhave, puthujjano dukkhaya vedanaya phuttho samano socati kilamati paridevati urattalim kandati sammoham apajjati.
sn36.6:1.10: Evanhi so, bhikkhave, puriso dvisallena vedanam vedayati.
sn36.6:1.11: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, assutava puthujjano dukkhaya vedanaya phuttho samano socati kilamati paridevati urattalim kandati sammoham apajjati.
sn36.6:1.14: Tassayeva kho pana dukkhaya vedanaya phuttho samano patighava hoti.
sn36.6:1.15: Tamenam dukkhaya vedanaya patighavantam, yo dukkhaya vedanaya patighanusayo, so anuseti.
sn36.6:1.16: So dukkhaya vedanaya phuttho samano kamasukham abhinandati.
sn36.6:1.18: Na hi so, bhikkhave, pajanati assutava puthujjano annatra kamasukha dukkhaya vedanaya nissaranam,
sn36.6:1.19: tassa kamasukhanca abhinandato, yo sukhaya vedanaya raganusayo, so anuseti.
sn36.6:1.20: So tasam vedananam samudayanca atthangamanca assadanca adinavanca nissarananca yathabhutam nappajanati.
sn36.6:1.21: Tassa tasam vedananam samudayanca atthangamanca assadanca adinavanca nissarananca yathabhutam appajanato, yo adukkhamasukhaya vedanaya avijjanusayo, so anuseti.
sn36.6:1.22: So sukhance vedanam vedayati, sannutto nam vedayati.
sn36.6:1.23: Dukkhance vedanam vedayati, sannutto nam vedayati.
sn36.6:1.24: Adukkhamasukhance vedanam vedayati, sannutto nam vedayati.
sn36.6:1.25: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, ‘assutava puthujjano sannutto jatiya jaraya maranena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upayasehi, sannutto dukkhasma’ti vadami.
sn36.6:2.1: Sutava ca kho, bhikkhave, ariyasavako dukkhaya vedanaya phuttho samano na socati, na kilamati, na paridevati, na urattalim kandati, na sammoham apajjati.
sn36.6:3.2: Tamenam dutiyena sallena anuvedham na vijjheyya.
sn36.6:3.3: Evanhi so, bhikkhave, puriso ekasallena vedanam vedayati.
sn36.6:3.4: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako dukkhaya vedanaya phuttho samano na socati, na kilamati, na paridevati, na urattalim kandati, na sammoham apajjati.
sn36.6:3.7: Tassayeva kho pana dukkhaya vedanaya phuttho samano patighava na hoti.
sn36.6:3.8: Tamenam dukkhaya vedanaya appatighavantam, yo dukkhaya vedanaya patighanusayo, so nanuseti.
sn36.6:3.9: So dukkhaya vedanaya phuttho samano kamasukham nabhinandati.
sn36.6:3.11: Pajanati hi so, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako annatra kamasukha dukkhaya vedanaya nissaranam.
sn36.6:3.12: Tassa kamasukham nabhinandato yo sukhaya vedanaya raganusayo, so nanuseti.
sn36.6:3.13: So tasam vedananam samudayanca atthangamanca assadanca adinavam ca nissarananca yathabhutam pajanati.
sn36.6:3.14: Tassa tasam vedananam samudayanca atthangamanca assadanca adinavanca nissarananca yathabhutam pajanato, yo adukkhamasukhaya vedanaya avijjanusayo, so nanuseti.
sn36.6:3.15: So sukhance vedanam vedayati, visannutto nam vedayati.
sn36.6:3.16: Dukkhance vedanam vedayati, visannutto nam vedayati.
sn36.6:3.17: Adukkhamasukhance vedanam vedayati, visannutto nam vedayati.
sn36.6:3.18: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, ‘sutava ariyasavako visannutto jatiya jaraya maranena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upayasehi, visannutto dukkhasma’ti vadami.
sn36.6:3.19: Ayam kho, bhikkhave, viseso, ayam adhippayaso, idam nanakaranam sutavato ariyasavakassa assutavata puthujjanenati.
